downloadDescription: Windows Embedded 8.1 Industry Release Notes for Windows Embedded 8.1 Industry Pro & Enterprise
detailsSection:
This document provides Windows Embedded 8.1 Industry Release Notes for
  • Windows Embedded 8.1 Industry Pro
  • Windows Embedded 8.1 Industry Enterprise
Windows Embedded 8.1 Industry extends Windows 8.1 to a range of edge devices across retail, manufacturing, healthcare and any other industries in which powerful line-of-business applications and the ability to perform a specialized function in a secure and reliable way is paramount.
systemRequirementsSection:
Windows Embedded 8.1 Industry Pro

Windows Embedded 8.1 Industry Enterprise



To browse the Release Notes file you will need a Web browser or other application that allows you to view htm files.
installInstructionSection: Click the Download button on this page to start the download.
